channel.title: Westbourne Estates Lettings
channel.description: Your Latest Property Information - Showing all properties

item.title:
First Avenue. W10
- £465
item.description:
Charming furnished Victorian house with delightful private garden.

The house has been newly decorated throughout 2 double bedrooms, refurbished bathroom, double reception and newly fitted kitchen.

The property is situated close to Queens Park.

item.title:
Pembridge Road. W11
- £465
item.description:
An extremely spacious unfurnished newly refurbished 2nd and 3rd floor maisonette above commercial premises in Notting Hill, ideal for sharers, and has wood flooring, high ceilings, and electric night storage heating.

2nd Floor : 1 double bedroom, reception room, open plan kitchen with washing machine
3rd Floor : 1 double bedroom, bathroom with shower.

item.title:
Queensway. W2
- £485
item.description:
A well presented two bedroom flat situated on the 4th floor of this purpose built block with lift and daytime porter. The flat further benefits from having a West facing balcony with views over Hyde Park.

2 double bedrooms, fitted wardrobes, reception room, separate fitted kitchen with washer/dryer, bathroom and guest wc.

item.title:
Linden Gardens. W2
- £485
item.description:
A ground floor, newly decorated, furnished flat in a conversion of a double fronted period property with lots of period features.

2 bedrooms (1 double, 1 single), reception, bathroom, and fitted kitchen with washer/dryer.

The flat is ideally located for the amenities of Notting Hill.

item.title:
Artesian Road, London. W2
- £495
item.description:
Ideally situated on the 3rd floor in this very popular portered development, is this 2 bedroom apartment, with separate fitted kitchen, 1 bathroom and a large reception room..

Tucked away behind Westbourne Grove, the apartment benefits from having wood floors and communal gardens.

The Westbourne is within easy walking distance of Notting Hill's many shops and restaurants and transport facilities.

item.title:
Westbourne Gardens, London. W2
- £525
item.description:
A raised ground floor flat in a conversion on a quiet garden square, which has the benefit of wood floors and slate floors in bathroom.

2 double bedrooms with carpet, fitted wardrobes, bathroom with shower attachment, en suite shower room, reception room, open-plan kitchen with washing machine, dishwasher, and microwave.

The flat is ideally located for the amenities of Bayswater and is within easy walking distance to Hyde Park.

item.title:
Southwick Street. W2
- £550
item.description:
A well presented 4th floor flat in this modern 24 hour portered block with lift.

2 double bedrooms, reception room with dining area and balcony, fully fitted kitchen with washer/dryer, ceramic tiled floors, and bathroomwith ceramic tiled floors, the rest is carpeted.

The flat is ideally situated for the amenities of Marble Arch and Paddington Station.

item.title:
Westbourne Terrace, London. W2
- £550
item.description:
A bright 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom flat, located on the 2nd floor of this period terraced building.

Presented in clean order and with parking on a first come first served basis.

Westbourne Terrace is a wide, leafy road, moments from Paddington Station and also within easy reach of both Notting Hill and Hyde Park.

item.title:
Harrowby Street. W1H
- £565
item.description:
Newly refurbished bright and spacious 2nd & 3rd floor maisonette in a conversion of a period house just off Edgware Road.

2 double bedrooms with oak wood flooring, 1 bathroom, reception with wood floors fitted kitchen with washer/dryer.

The flat is ideally located for the amenities of the West End.

item.title:
Moorhouse Road. W2
- £575
item.description:
A well presented light 2 bedroom flat on the first floor in a conversion which has the benefit of high ceilings, wood floors throughout, and a balcony.

2 bedrooms, wardrobes, reception room, kitchen with washing machine, and bathroom with hand shower.

The property is close to all the amenities of Notting Hill and Portobello Market.

item.title:
Kensington Gardens Square. W2
- £595
item.description:
Superb 4th floor flat (top) in portered block with lift, gym, squash court, swimming pool/ sauna, underground car parking space.

The flat offers 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite), spacious reception room with wood floors and open plan kitchen, washer/dryer and dishwasher. Ornamental balcony.

Close to Queensway & Bayswater tubes.
